## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SPDT, SULTR3;4</u>
- **Gene Name:** SULTR-like P Distribution Transporter, sulfate transporter 3;4
- **Description:**   sulfate transporter 3;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_068355]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced growth under low P levels; P  13 concentration in the newest leaves was significantly lower; P concentration in the  28 xylem sap was significantly higher.
